fulltext:
f30f4d04486111e2a2aa782bcb07413522a84532f1d443ffb62c5fcf3c59545a;2019-02-27T12:09:25Z;corpus;corpus:text;EUROPARL Corpus
Parallel Corpora: Portuguese-English
;The EUROPARL Corpus (subpart Portuguese-English of the parallel corpora), available at http://www.statmt.org/europarl/, was extracted from the proceedings of the European Parliament (Koehn, 2005). It contains transcriptions of sessions dating back from 1996 to 2011, in a total of approximately 58,324,562 tokens words of European Portuguese (L1) and 49,216,896 tokens of English (translation).;2013-01-21
name: 5df845df-5d00-541b-8422-02e139a349f5
notes: The EUROPARL Corpus (subpart Portuguese-English of the parallel corpora), available at http://www.statmt.org/europarl/, was extracted from the proceedings of the European Parliament (Koehn, 2005). It contains transcriptions of sessions dating back from 1996 to 2011, in a total of approximately 58,324,562 tokens words of European Portuguese (L1) and 49,216,896 tokens of English (translation).
title:
EUROPARL Corpus
Parallel Corpora: Portuguese-English
